name: Computer Rain
description:
collect computer components
and try to reach the same stack as provided

if you collect the wrong component
use the star to obtain 1 more chance










left and right - move
left click - press buttons
spacebar - play again
esc - exit





ariane gomes - game design/code
bruna fernandes - art/game design
esther hoffmann - art/game design
thaís dordan - game design/code
